a:StringInput.name: aws-key
a:StringInput.a:Explanation: AWS access credentials. The Access Key ID is 20 alpha-numeric characters like 022QF06E7MXBSH9DHM02 and is not secret.

a:StringInput.name: aws-secret
a:StringInput.a:Explanation: AWS access credentials. The Secret Access Key is 40 alpha-numeric-slash-plus characters like kWcrlUX5JEDGM/LtmEENI/aVmYvHNif5zB+d9+ct and must be kept very secret.

a:StringInput.name: aws-queue-name
a:StringInput.a:Explanation: AWS Queue Name -- this is the particular queue that this monitor will listen for events.
